name: DISH Network Military & First Responder Discount
description: Over $500 savings with free Stars & Stripes pack + monthly movie + Hopper DVR
fullDescription: DISH Network offers exclusive military and first responder packages including free Stars & Stripes channel pack, monthly movie rental, and Hopper DVR upgrade - over $500 savings over 2 years.
whatTheyOffer:
- Stars & Stripes channel pack FREE for 2 years ($240 value)
- Channels include STARZ, Encore, Smithsonian, American Heroes Channel
- Free Pay-Per-View movie rental every month
- Free Hopper DVR upgrade (stream content anywhere)
- 2-year price guarantee starting at $89.99/mo
- Up to $300 gift card for new TV + Internet customers
howToGetIt:
1. Call DISH or visit dish.com/offers/military-offer
2. Verify military/first responder status through ID.me
3. Eligible: active duty military, veterans, first responders
4. First responders include firefighters, EMTs, police
5. 2-year commitment required ($20/mo ETF if canceled early)
keywords: DISH, satellite TV, military discount, veteran, first responder, Stars and Stripes, Hopper DVR, ID.me
